::Prowl/Hot Rod/Epyon::

Prowl sat next to Alpha, trying to cheer her up.
"It'll be ok, Alpha. We will help Condor, and make the Decepticons pay."

Not far outside the IGL base, Hot Rod was driving at full speed, with
Epyon flying overhead, although lagging in speed a bit.
"Epyon, contact the city, and inform them," suggested Hot Rod.

"Got it," responded Epyon. 
He activated his commlink.
"Epyon to Maximal City. Khonkolor, Hot Rod, and myself are returning to
Maximal City from the IGL. We are bringing the Maximal Condor with us,
who was reprogrammed into a Decepticon. We'll arive soon."

They continued onward.

The message was routed to Prowl's comm unit, and played for him and
Alpha. his eyes lit up.
"Well there you go Alpha. Two in one. They are heading back, and they
have Condor with them."
He pressed the respond button on his unit, linking the comm units.
"Prowl here. Good work, you guys. I believe Alpha would like to speak
with you."
He transferred the link to Alpha's comm channel, so it was on her unit.
